branchCategory.name: S0700
branchCategory.description: <p>S0700 series is a 5 port solenoid valve that offers a compact design (7.4mm width) with high flow capacity.  It is suited to drive cylinders up to 32 diameter or as pilot for other valves.  S0700 is available as Base mounted or Body ported.  Available interface include fieldbus, terminal block, lead wire, and circular connectors.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves (All Types)
branchItem.description: <p>S0700 valve is available as base mounted for manifold mounting or as body ported.</p>

branchItem.name: Manifolds
branchItem.description: <p>Manifold options for S0700 series.  Available interface include fieldbus and ethernet connectivity, D-sub connectors, flat ribbon cable, PC wiring system compatible, flat ribbon cable, terminal block, lead wire, and circular connectors. </p>
